projects.subtitle: High-standard, detail-driven delivery. A curated visual portfolio of selected work and sample renovation comparisons.

humanResources.lead: Would you like to join the KardenTech Engineering team? We are looking for teammates who create value with us, are eager to learn, and take ownership.
humanResources.infoText: Upload your CV and add a short cover letter. Your application will be processed for delivery to the owner's email (email service integration is left as a placeholder in this demo).

placeholders.coverLetter: Briefly introduce yourself and the position you are applying for.

contact.lead: Reach out to us — send a quick message via WhatsApp or contact us by email.

whatsapp.title: Send a WhatsApp Message
whatsapp.instruction: Fill out the form; your message will open in WhatsApp as a pre-filled text.

hero.headline: We Create Livable Spaces Designed for You.
hero.subtext: With modern engineering, strong project management, and high quality standards, we build sustainable and livable solutions.

corporate.title: KardenTech Engineering
corporate.text: With expertise in engineering and contracting, we create livable spaces tailored to your needs. We manage planning, design and execution under a single quality standard to deliver long-lasting results.

services.title: End-to-End Engineering & Delivery
services.subtitle: We provide our core services in a premium, clear and modular structure.
services.cardText: A process and execution standard optimized to your project scale.

corporatePage.title: KardenTech Engineering
corporatePage.subtitle: We Create Livable Spaces Designed for You.

about.title: About Us
about.text: KardenTech is a Bodrum-based engineering and contracting firm specializing in high-quality living spaces. We blend aesthetic design with robust engineering and disciplined on-site execution. Our goal is to deliver long-lasting solutions through solid planning, transparent communication and sustainable quality.

competencies.title: Core Competencies
competencies.subtitle: Comprehensive expertise across design and execution.

missionVision.missionText: Deliver projects on time with the highest quality standards, prioritizing customer satisfaction.
missionVision.visionText: To be the leading engineering and contracting brand in our region, known for innovative and sustainable solutions.
